HomePage.title: Israsel - Israeli Open Data Search Engine
HomePage.description: Search and explore Israeli open data with Israsel, the premier search engine for datasets from various government ministries and agencies.
HomePage.keywords: Israeli open data, government datasets, data search engine, public data
HomePage.landing_title: Israsel - Israeli Cars Open Data Search Engine
HomePage.landing_description: Search and explore Israeli open data about cars with Israsel, the premier search engine for datasets from various government ministries and agencies.
HomePage.videoTagNotSupported: Your browser does not support the video tag.

Footer.mainMessage: Creating awesome content takes time, effort, and lots of coffee! If this project helped you or brought a smile to your face, Share it with your friends in Israel!

Metadata.siteDescription: Your one-stop source for comprehensive information on Israeli license plates. Enter a car number to get details on ownership, history, and technical data.
Metadata.keywords: israel, license plate, car number, vehicle information, car check, israsel

ContactPage.title: Get In Touch
ContactPage.description: Have a question or want to work together? We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.

CarCheck.errorEmptyInput: Please enter a license plate number.
CarCheck.errorInvalidPlate: License plate must be 6 or 7 or 8 digits.
CarCheck.searchHint: Enter your 7 or 8-digit vehicle registration number to access official Ministry of Transport data
CarCheck.errorNotFound: No information found for vehicle number: {carNumber}. Try demo number: 1234567
CarCheck.inactiveVehicleWarning: it is not legally allowed on the road.
CarCheck.noOutstandingRecalls: This vehicle has no outstanding safety recalls.
CarCheck.ownershipHelpDealerDesc: Vehicle was owned by an authorized dealer or commercial entity.
CarCheck.ownershipHelpPrivateDesc: Vehicle was owned by a private individual.
CarCheck.ownershipHelpLeaseDesc: Vehicle was under a leasing agreement.
CarCheck.ownershipHelpDateFormatDesc: Month and Year of the ownership change.
CarCheck.noOwnershipHistoryDesc: There is no known ownership history for this vehicle.
